project.title: Streamkiwi
project.content:
I like watching the dev community on Twitch. But while using the platform I wished there was a way to get an overview of all the people you were following, and when they were going to stream next.
So I built it! The app is built using Nextjs, @veccu/react-calendar and the Twitch API.

project.title: What genre
project.content: When I first started coding I noticed the importance of building your own projects that you can feel passionate about. What Genre was one of the first projects I did. Using Spotify's API it checks what genre a given artist has.

project.title: Pasteldeck
project.content: I was in a fun mood so I made a cute slideshow generator. I would not recommend it for heavy use. But I would recommend it if you quickly need a cute looking pastel slideshow with little text.

project.title: Spotify to slack
project.content: When I just started with JavaScript, I created a little app inspired by msn statusses from back in the day. You can run it locally to sync the song you're listening to on Spotify with your Slack status.

project.title: Oob this
project.content: One of my favorite podcasts 'delete this' inspired me to create a small website that replaces each vowel in a word with 'oob'. It was loads of fun to make and I totally geeked out when they mentioned it in their podcast.
